column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////It ended up being SO delicious that we went there a second time (in just 3 days!) and this was definitely the better location
column2: mostly due to the additional seating. Since we were there the morning after St. Paddy's
column3: I can tell you that their hangover-friendly bloody mary is fantastic! It's not too thick
column4: and it has just the right amount of kick
column5: if you order it spicy. I shared a house salad
column6: and while it was fairly standard
column7: it was nice after such a health-less weekend to get some greens in...
